properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_NICK, MEM_TEL, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_GRADE,BROKER_CRETI, BROKER_ADDR, APPROVE_FL FROM V_BROKER_LOGIN WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PW = ? AND SCSN_FL = 'N' AND APPROVE_FL = 'Y' AND MEM_GRADE = 'B'
SELECT MEM_PW FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET SCSN_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEM_NO = ?
